references.paper_title: Diffusion convolutional recurrent neural network: Data-driven traffic forecasting
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel deep learning model for traffic forecasting, which is highly relevant to the spatiotemporal learning framework discussed in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Attention based spatial-temporal graph convolutional networks for traffic flow forecasting
references.reason: This paper proposes a graph convolutional network model for traffic flow forecasting, incorporating attention mechanisms to capture spatiotemporal dependencies.

references.paper_title: Graph wavenet for deep spatial-temporal graph modeling
references.reason: This paper introduces Graph WaveNet, which is a powerful deep learning model for spatial-temporal data and relevant to the study.

references.paper_title: Spatio-temporal graph convolutional networks: A deep learning framework for traffic forecasting
references.reason: This paper introduces a deep learning framework for traffic forecasting using spatio-temporal graph convolutional networks.

references.paper_title: Connecting the dots: Multivariate time series forecasting with graph neural networks
references.reason: This paper focuses on multivariate time series forecasting using graph neural networks, addressing a similar problem and using related techniques to the main paper.
